address: Xã Nghĩa Sơn, Huyện Nghĩa Hưng, Tỉnh Nam Định
thought:
**Determining the New Administrative Unit for "Xã Nghĩa Sơn, Huyện Nghĩa Hưng, Tỉnh Nam Định"**

Okay, so the user wants the new address for "Xã Nghĩa Sơn" in the old province of "Tỉnh Nam Định".  My initial approach is to break this down logically. First, I need to figure out the current province.  I know there was a province merger in Vietnam, so I checked province resolutions (like 60-NQ/TW) and found that "Tỉnh Nam Định" was merged into "Tỉnh Ninh Bình."

Next, I zeroed in on the ward itself, "Xã Nghĩa Sơn". Since the province changed, I started looking for any relevant information within the context of "Tỉnh Ninh Bình." I examined "Other resolutions" and found Resolution 1674/NQ-UBTVQH15, specifically related to the administrative rearrangements within Ninh Bình province. Line 62 of this resolution was key: it describes the merger of "Xã Nghĩa Lạc" and "Xã Nghĩa Sơn" into a *new* "Xã Nghĩa Sơn." This is a perfect match!  The new "Xã Nghĩa Sơn" is now within "Tỉnh Ninh Bình," which I already confirmed.

To confirm further, I checked the "New wards" data. There, I found a matching entry: `{"ward_code":"13918","ward_name":"Xã Nghĩa Sơn","province_name":"Tỉnh Ninh Bình"}`. This solidifies the information.

So, the new administrative unit is clearly "Xã Nghĩa Sơn" in "Tỉnh Ninh Bình," with the ward code 13918. The citation for this is Resolution 1674/NQ-UBTVQH15, line 62. The confidence in this finding is very high because it's a direct match and clearly addresses the ward and its province after the merger.  This is a clean and straightforward case.

citation.header: 1674/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Ninh Bình
citation.line: 62. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của xã Nghĩa Lạc và xã Nghĩa Sơn thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Nghĩa Sơn.
